stories.text:
I'm seeking practical advice on how to develop critical thinking. I need it in my life. I want to have independent though, and not be bound to anyone's view of the world without forming my own. Especially in our age it's a life or death skills to have.

I my critical thinking skills are very poor for my age.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to start developing critical thinking?

stories.text: Looks like they waited more then 35 minutes in the case of this Texas shooting and were actively preventing parents from getting in.
stories.title: Ask HN: How long should Police wait to get in school with active shooter present

stories.text:
I upvote HN posts for different reasons. Sometimes I just want to show appreciation for sharing a specific story. Sometimes it's a tool, or article that might be useful for {work, project A, project B}. Sometimes it's just funny random facts I would like to remember.
Whatever the category, I was wondering if there is a good, easy way to organize the upvotes.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you organize your HN upvotes?
